Class SlashUtility

Contains utility commands such as user and server information retrieval.

Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Utility
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("utility", "Utility commands like userinfo")]
public class SlashUtility : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<UtilityService>, IInteractionModuleBase

| Edit this page View Source

Avatar(IUser)

Displays the avatar of a specified user, with an option to switch between their global Discord avatar and their server-specific avatar.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("avatar", "Shows a user's avatar", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.SendMessages)]
[UserCommand("Avatar")]
public Task Avatar(IUser usr = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IUser usr

The user whose avatar is to be displayed. If null, the command invoker's avatar is used.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of sending the avatar image.
| Edit this page View Source

Avatar(string, ulong)

Displays the avatar of a user. This can either be their global Discord avatar or their server-specific avatar if available.

Declaration
[ComponentInteraction("avatartype:*,*", true, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.SendMessages)]
public Task Avatar(string avType, ulong userId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string avType

The type of avatar to display ("real" for global, "guild" for server-specific).
ulong userId

The ID of the user whose avatar is being requested.
Returns
Type Description
Task
| Edit this page View Source

Banner(string, ulong)

Toggles between displaying a user's real banner and their guild-specific banner.

Declaration
[ComponentInteraction("avatartype:*,*", true, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.SendMessages)]
public Task Banner(string avType, ulong userId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string avType

Specifies the type of banner to display. "real" for the user's global Discord banner, "guild" for the guild-specific banner.
ulong userId

The ID of the user whose banner is being requested.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of updating the interaction with the requested banner information.
Remarks

This method allows users to interactively switch between viewing a user's global banner and a guild-specific banner if available.

ChannelInfo(ITextChannel)

Displays detailed information about a text channel, such as its ID, creation date, number of users, NSFW status, and more.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("channelinfo", "Shows info for the current or mentioned channel", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.SendMessages)]
public Task ChannelInfo(ITextChannel channel = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ITextChannel channel

The text channel to display information about. If null, uses the current channel.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of sending an embed with channel information.
| Edit this page View Source

Fetch(string)

Retrieves and displays detailed information about a user, whether they are part of the server or not, using their Discord ID.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("fetch", "Gets a user, even if they aren't in the server.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.SendMessages)]
public Task Fetch(string userIdstring)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string userIdstring

The user ID as a string. Must be convertible to an ulong.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of displaying fetched user information.

GenerateTimestamp(string, DateTime, TimestampTagStyles)

Converts a local time to a universal Discord timestamp, allowing it to be displayed in the user's local timezone when viewed on Discord.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("timestamp", "Converts your local time to a universal timestamp", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task GenerateTimestamp(string tz, DateTime time, TimestampTagStyles format = TimestampTagStyles.ShortDateTime)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string tz

The timezone ID for the time conversion.
DateTime time

The local time to be converted to a timestamp.
TimestampTagStyles format

The format of the timestamp to be generated.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of sending the timestamp.

GetJson(ulong, ITextChannel)

Retrieves the JSON representation of a specified message. This can be used for debugging or as a template for constructing custom embeds.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("getjson", "Gets the json from a message to use with our embed builder!", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task GetJson(ulong messageId, ITextChannel channel = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong messageId

The ID of the message to convert to JSON format.
ITextChannel channel

The channel from which the message will be fetched. If not specified, uses the current channel.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of sending the message's JSON representation to the requester.

MoreSInfo()

Provides additional server information on request via a component interaction, including counts of bots, users, channels, roles, and server features.

Declaration

public Task MoreSInfo()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of updating the original interaction response with more detailed server information.
| Edit this page View Source

MoreUInfo(ulong)

Provides additional user information via a component interaction, including roles, voice channel states, and mute status within the server.

Declaration
[ComponentInteraction("moreuinfo:*", true, RunMode.Default)]
public Task MoreUInfo(ulong userId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong userId

The ID of the user for whom additional information is being requested.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of updating the original interaction response with detailed user information.
Remarks

This method is triggered by an interactive component, allowing users to request more detailed information about a specific user within the server.

Say(ITextChannel)

Prompts the user with a modal to send a custom message to a specified channel. This can include text and embeds.

Declaration

[SlashUserPerm(ChannelPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task Say(ITextChannel channel = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ITextChannel channel

The channel to which the message will be sent. If not specified, uses the current channel.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of responding with a modal for message input.
| Edit this page View Source

SayModal(ulong, SayModal)

Processes a modal submission for sending a message. Allows sending messages with text, embeds, and components.

Declaration
[ModalInteraction("saymodal:*", true, RunMode.Default)]
public Task SayModal(ulong channelId, SayModal modal)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong channelId

The ID of the channel where the message will be sent.
SayModal modal

The modal containing the message to be sent.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of sending a message and confirming its delivery.
Remarks

This method handles modal submissions from the "say" command, processing user input and sending the resulting message to the specified channel.

UserInfo(IUser)

Shows detailed information about a user, including their server roles, activities, join dates, and any server-specific attributes like nicknames.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("userinfo", "Shows info for a mentioned or current user", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.SendMessages)]
[UserCommand("User Info")]
public Task UserInfo(IUser usr = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IUser usr

The user to display information about. If null, uses the command invoker.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of displaying user information.
Remarks

This command also provides a button for additional, detailed information.

| Edit this page View Source

VInfo(IVoiceChannel)

Displays information about a voice channel, including the number of users in the channel, its creation date, bitrate, and user limit.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("voiceinfo", "Shows info for a voice channel", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.SendMessages)]
public Task VInfo(IVoiceChannel channel = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IVoiceChannel channel

The voice channel to display information about. If null, attempts to use the voice channel the user is currently in.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of sending an embed with voice channel information.
